definitions.definition: Given to thought , or to the examination of subjects by contemplation; contemplative .
Dedicated to study ; devoted to the acquisition of knowledge from books

examples: She is studious to find new friends and allies
labels: usually followed by an infinitive or by "of"
definitions.label_groups: usually followed by an infinitive or by "of"

definitions.definition: Favorable to study; suitable for thought and contemplation

main_definition: Given to thought , or to the examination of subjects by contemplation; contemplative .
secondary_definitions: Dedicated to study ; devoted to the acquisition of knowledge from books
( usually followed by an infinitive or by "of" ) Earnest in endeavors; attentive ; diligent
Favorable to study; suitable for thought and contemplation
